A patient of left sided Meniere’s disease does not respond to conventional medical treatment. His episodes are becoming more frequent and he has developed severe sensorineural hearing loss on left side. Identify the treatment being rendered to patient in given picture?

questions.correct_answer: D. It is not indicated in patients with chronic discharging ear with hearing loss
